com.app.clearing

Class RoundClearingMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.clearing.RoundClearingMaster

  • public class RoundClearingMaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Students will only be informed of their bid status after the end of the round. After the end of the round, sort the bids from the highest to lowest. Derive the minimum clearing price based on the number of vacancies, i.e. if the class has 35 vacancies, the 35th highest bid is the clearing price. If there is only one bid at the clearing price, it will be successful. Otherwise, all bids at the clearing price will be dropped regardless of whether they can technically all be accommodated (refer to example). Students are charged based on the amount they bid. Student will be refunded e$ for unsuccessful bids. The minimum bid for round 1 is $10.

    • Method Detail

      • executeRound1ClearingProcess

        public static void executeRound1ClearingProcess()
                                         throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Executes Round 1 clearing process with its associated clearing logic. It will execute changes in the MySQL DB. Upon populating section_student table (for successful bids) and failed_bid table (for failed bids), bid table will be emptied.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException

      • executeRound2ClearingProcess

        public static void executeRound2ClearingProcess()
        Executes Round 2 clearing process with its associated clearing logic.

      • isolateSpecificBids

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Bid> isolateSpecificBids(java.util.ArrayList<Bid> mainList,
                                           Bid bidElement)
        Returns an ArrayList of Bids that has the same course and section as the specified Bid element, from the main list specified. The bids that are isolated and returned, will be removed from the main list upon the execution of this method.
        Parameters:
        mainList - entire list of bids retrieve from the database
        bidElement - representative bid object that represent all the bids in that specific section
        Returns:
        ArrayList ArrayList which has the same course and section as the specified Bid element

      • getClearingPrice

        private static java.math.BigDecimal getClearingPrice(java.util.ArrayList<Bid> specificBidList,
                                    Section sectionElement)
        Returns the clearing price of the specified list of bids, determined by the class size of the specified Section element
        Parameters:
        specificBidList - the bid list that you want the clearing price to be determined for.
        sectionElement - the Section element that corresponds to the list of bids specified.
        Returns:
        ArrayList the clearing price of the specified list of bids, determined by the class size of the specified Section element

      • retrieveSuccessfulBids

        private static java.util.ArrayList<Bid> retrieveSuccessfulBids(java.util.ArrayList<Bid> specificBidList,
                                              java.math.BigDecimal clearingPrice)
        Return a list of bids that is greater than the clearing price. These bids are successful. Bids equal to the clearing price WILL NOT be successful
        Parameters:
        specificBidList - all bids for the specific section
        clearingPrice - clearing price
        Returns:
        a list of bids that is greater than the clearing price.
